summary: Completed production readiness testing for CoinHubX deployment at coinhubx.net. CRITICAL ISSUE DISCOVERED: Domain redirects to parking page instead of serving the application. Backend works internally but is inaccessible externally.

critical_bugs.description: coinhubx.net redirects to parking/lander page instead of serving CoinHubX application
critical_bugs.impact: Complete production deployment failure - users cannot access the application
critical_bugs.evidence: All API calls to https://coinhubx.net/api/* return HTML redirect to lander page

critical_bugs.impact: Admin cannot access liquidity management panel

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 400 error 'Unable to fetch market price for BTC'

critical_bugs.issue: All pages redirect to parking/lander page
critical_bugs.evidence: Screenshots show parking page for all routes: /, /login, /dashboard, /admin/liquidity, /p2p

passed_tests: User Registration API - Working (63.6% backend success rate)
User Login API - Working with JWT tokens
Live Prices API - Working with 9 cryptocurrencies
P2P Marketplace API - Working (0 offers but functional)
Backend Services Running - All supervisor services active
Database Connection - MongoDB working with coinhubx_production DB
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix domain configuration for coinhubx.net to serve the actual CoinHubX application instead of parking page. Check DNS, nginx, or hosting provider settings. Backend is working internally but completely inaccessible externally. Also fix admin login credentials and instant buy market price fetching.
blocking_issues: Domain configuration prevents all external access
deployment_recommendations: Verify nginx/reverse proxy settings for coinhubx.net
Test admin credentials and fix authentication
Resolve market price fetching for instant buy
Conduct full end-to-end testing after domain fix
